channel.title: Most popular plants on our platform
channel.description: Down below you can find a list of our most renowned plants on our botanical platform!

item.title: Jasmine
item.description: Scientific Name: Jasminum officinale Part of the Family: Oleaceae And the Genus: Jasminum Species of: officinale Collected at: China Popularity: 50 visits until now!

item.title: Chamomile
item.description: Scientific Name: Helianthus annuus Part of the Family: Asteraceae And the Genus: Matricaria Species of: chamomilla Collected at: Germany Popularity: 45 visits until now!

item.title: Hydrangea
item.description: Scientific Name: Hydrangea paniculata Part of the Family: Hydrangeaceae And the Genus: Hydrangea Species of: hydrangea-paniculata Popularity: 7 visits until now!

item.title: Mint
item.description: Scientific Name: Mentha Part of the Family: Lamiaceae And the Genus: Mentha Species of: Mentha spicata Collected at: Bucharest Popularity: 6 visits until now!

item.title: Mint
item.description: Scientific Name: Mentha aquatica Part of the Family: Lamiaceae And the Genus: Mentha Species of: mentha-aquatica Popularity: 6 visits until now!

item.title: Tulips
item.description: Scientific Name: Tulipa sylvestris Part of the Family: Liliaceae And the Genus: Tulipa Species of: tulipa-sylvestris Collected at: Botragy Popularity: 5 visits until now!

item.title: Cactus
item.description: Scientific Name: Cylindropuntia imbricata Part of the Family: Cactaceae And the Genus: Cylindropuntia Species of: cylindropuntia-imbricata Popularity: 3 visits until now!

item.title: Succulent
item.description: Scientific Name: Crataegus succulenta Part of the Family: Rosaceae And the Genus: Crataegus Species of: crataegus-succulenta Popularity: 3 visits until now!

item.title: Mint
item.description: Scientific Name: Mentha aquatica Part of the Family: Lamiaceae And the Genus: Mentha Species of: mentha-aquatica Popularity: 3 visits until now!
